ygData.subject: Re: Prexus Server-2
ygData.msgSnippet: Prexus server would be great to create another new char as its new and most of us will be starting at all most the same lvl. I was in there for a while last
ygData.messageBody:
Prexus server would be great to create another new char as its new and most
of us will be starting at all most the same lvl.
I was in there for a while last nite and saw some ppl lvl at 7th already .
wow !
One thing i'll missed on new server is the high lvl ppl i need to consult
with. Currently , I know of a couple high lvl ppl 26-35, that i can turn to
for tips and tricks.
Gm is not much of help

Alas!, I'll MOST likely be stuck on Innoruuk server.
Its an issue of time onhand to RPGing this game. I would like to see my Monk
Char lvl up to 30+ .... b4 i consider another char or another server.

Btw, im venturing into Freeport Underground tonite, dunno if there anything
there.

Cya guys.

Yiyang of Innorruk



-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 9:51 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Prexus Server


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>I created a gnomish wizard last night, after considering all the pro and
>cons. No doubt TSK is cool, but I think we need a wiz for group gate at
>higher lvl. Moveover, with the previous experience, I feel more
>comfortable making one. Comparing all races available for wizard, gnome
>seem to be the best (in fact they are more suitable for magical class then
>other races). They may not have the highest INT (acually 2nd highest), but
>their overall stats are more suitable as a wiz - high INT, DEX & AGI. Only
>problem is their low CHA, which mean I'm buying scrolls are 10-20% higher
>than my High Elf wiz - gate scroll at 6gp instead of 5 in Felwithe. On the
>other hand, having high AGI and DEX allow me to avoid more enemies attacks
>and cast faster. I only throw in 5 for my STR, coz 60 is too low to carry
>loot around. I top up my AGI and DEX with 5 points each to 90, the rest
>goes to my INT, making it 123. A wiz life is hard for pple like me, since
>I do not have more time to play as compared to those who are having their
>study holiday now, but I guess I'm already get used to it ;) On yeah, with
>my previous experience in Innoruuk, I can also save more money from not
>buying those useless spells, hehe. That makes up for the higher price I'm
>paying due to low CHA.
>
>I spend 5 hrs last night, getting my char to lvl 4. No doubt Prexus got
>the most players (900) amg all servers when I first login, but I encounter
>no lag at all. The whole newbie hunting ground outside gnome city is very
>crowded when I just login around 7pm but at 8pm onwards, the crowded
>reduced by alot, guess it's working/schooling time for most US/Canada
>players then.
>
>Anyway I've changed my name. Zilxxx is a nice name which I like very much,
>but it's my last resort coz most of my favourite mage names are taken up in
>Innoruuk. In this new server I managed to get my favourite big bad evil
>archwizard name - Mondain. For those who grow with the 3 most popular RPG
>PC games (Utlima, Wizardry, M&M), Mondain is a name that strike fear in
>many Ultima players hearts. Yes, he is the evil archwiward that fight with
>Lord British in the very 1st series of Ultima!
>
>Now that we have a wiz, a necro, bard and a ranger. I think it's time we
>need a shaman/cleric and one more tank - warrior/paladin.
>
>Mondain (Wizard, Prexus)
>Ziltus (Wizard, Innoruuk)
>
>p/s: At least now I'm not always the last one to loot, LOL ;)
>
>On Wednesday, June 09, 1999 12:13 AM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
>wrote:
>> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>>
>> I created a necro already, dark elven too ) Hes level 3 now but i hope i
>can
>> get him to 4 b4 tomorrow ) Name is same, Leshrec. Gives easier time
>> recognising for everyone.
>> Laters
>> Leshrec
>> p.s. Whats your ICQ uin zil?
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>> Date: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 4:01 PM
>> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Prexus Server
>>
>>
>> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >
>> >LOL, me already there with a gnomish necromancer too, let make an evil
>dark
>> >twins, hehe. So coincident, we always select the same race and class,
>> >great minds think alike? LOL. I guess I better change char liao this
>time
>> >(thou I always fancy the Life Tap spells of necro), so that we can pair
>up
>> >to hunt. How abt a TSK? More evil than u leh. Hehe, since u wanna
>play
>> >evil, play dark-evil necro lor, ;) We can meet and tag team (tank and
>> >caster) to destroy all light in Prexus server!
>> >
>> >Regarding the XP thing, not sure if new EQ server gain xp faster, but
>it's
>> >very true for UO new server. In mature server it takes months to make a
>GM
>> >smith but in new server it only take a week or two. I guess it's not a
>bad
>> >time for us to try it out, esp our chars are all pretty young in
>Innoruuk.
>> > No harm trying too, say spend few days to a week there. Maybe we all
>gain
>> >much higher lvl in new server as compare to few weeks play in Innoruuk
>;)
>> >
>> >I think DE Necro and TSK will make a great EVIL team. One more shaman
>> >(healer/buffer) will be nice for a evil party, whahahahahahah!
>> >
>> >Btw Les, Gandalf is more for good char. Not so suitable for evil char
>leh.
>> >
>> >On Tuesday, June 08, 1999 3:40 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
>> >wrote:
>> >> As you guys might have known, the new server Prexus is up already.
>Being
>> >a wizard, I have always wanted to play the dark side and have always
>been
>> >fascinated by the necromancer's array of spells. Therefore i have
>decided
>> >to make a Gnomish Necromancer in the Prexus server and see how it goes.
>> >Being a new server, less people would probably be there, and thus the
>> >initial xp gain should be speedy enough. Anyone who is willing to switch
>> >servers for a while to try out the class they always wanted, but not
>able
>> >to bear to leave their main characters can always join me. )
>> >> My nick there would probably be Gandalf but if server does not allow
>it,
>> >then Khadgar or Leshrac. Laters!
>> >>
